alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80 (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 5:27PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Salt Lake and northwestern Utah Counties through 600 PM MDT... At 526 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Riverton, or 7 miles southwest of Sandy, moving northeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... West Valley City, Sandy, Murray, West Jordan, Taylorsville, South Jordan, Lehi, Draper, Riverton, Cottonwood Heights, Midvale, Holladay, Herriman, Bluffdale, Kearns, Little Cottonwood Creek Valley, Granite, Oquirrh, Cottonwood West and Millcreek. This includes Interstate 15 between mile markers 283 and 302. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains; Salt Lake Valley; Utah Valley; Wasatch Mountains South of I-80
